name: places/ChIJ2bPgTQRZwokR7-WlhRyucmE
adrFormatAddress: 831 Broadway, New York, NY 10003-4729, USA

originalText.text: Here’s what I asked of Bryan…sell my Midtown studio for top dollar and find me an affordable one bedroom on the Upper West Side AND time it so it I don’t have to spend tons on furniture storage or sleep for weeks, months on my friend’s couch. He did it without breaking a sweat!  Along with the Attorney he recommended they accomplished it all. Lucky for me, Bryan worked side by side with me throughout the Co-op Board process, always available to answer (a lot of) questions and calm my fraying nerves. Working with both the Buyer’s broker and the Seller’s broker, Bryan made sure everything went smoothly.  I will always recommend Bryan without hesitation because he certainly exceeded all my expectations!

originalText.text:
Bryan’s expertise helped me transition from a tenant to a homeowner in NYC in just four months. His vast knowledge of the area, extensive experience in the homebuying process, and high connection with other experts provided me with sufficient options and support that matched my needs.

My biggest challenge was finding a neighborhood that fit my criteria and a condo with good soundproof quality. Not only did Bryan punctually show me properties in three boroughs, but he also helped me test the walls and ceilings of each property to make sure that my next home would be peaceful. The rest of the process went well as he negotiated fairly on my behalf, delivered excellent support, and recommended other detail-oriented professionals who helped us immensely.

I extremely benefitted from Bryan’s expertise in the NYC real estate market. His hard work, client service skills, and professional network made my transition to homeownership a great experience. I highly recommend Bryan’s five-star service!

originalText.text: Bryan is a great real estate agent and one I have had the pleasure of working with multiple times.  He’s incredibly focused on meeting my needs in finding the right apartment.  He goes the extra mile to help validate board packages, mortgage advice and support across all facets of real estate transactions.

originalText.text: Bryan is extremely helpful, thoughtful, remarkably patient and very attentive to details. He generously offered me loads of helpful advice and never failed to answer my concerns and questions . Highly recommend his service !
